article_metadata.description: By Christopher Koch Got a headache? Upset stomach? Sore back? Better get yourself to the emergency room right away. Sounds absurd, doesn’t it? Yet these are some of the most common reasons that people visit emergency rooms in the US. Worse, Obamacare, which was supposed to reduce such silly ER visits, has actually [...]
